website_summaries.verdict: We recommend the Series 7 instead – it's only a little more expensive and offers a better shave.
pros: Has similar features to other models, including a waterproof and rechargeable design and pivoting shaver head
cons: Seems to miss whiskers here and there

customer_reviews.title: Item description was/is wrong.
customer_reviews.text: The product description says: "with Clean&Charge Station". This item does NOT come with that! I did not use the shaver, and sending it back. I have one similar to it and really like it. I will buy a different product that includes the Clean&Charge Station, as this is a very nice feature. Hopefully Amazon will fix the description, since I informed them of the problem today, 10/09/18.
customer_reviews.author: K. Worley

customer_reviews.title: I DID NOT GET A GOOD SHAVE.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Model S5. I have a heavy beard and shave every day. After 90 days I called the manufacturer to complain about the lack of a close shave and that the shaver started pulling. They told me that the manufacturer has 100 day guarantee, BUT it must be returned in the ORIGINAL box. I think this is an unreasonable requirement. I would not recommend this shaver for any one with a heavy beard. If you want to purchase this shaver, save the box and all packaging material for the 100 days.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Kessler

customer_reviews.title: While I liked the performance of the product
customer_reviews.text: While I liked the performance of the product, particularly the ability to clean it with running water, I am very disappointed in the quality. It lasted slightly more than 1 year before if simply stopped working. Yes, it has a 2 year warranty, but then there's the hassle of calling their customer service, proving when/how you purchased it, and ship it back and wait. I need a razor today,not 4 weeks from today. I expected this to last more than 1 year.
customer_reviews.author: Surfer Dude

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 6 weeks--very disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: Failed after 6 weeks, right before I was leaving for a trip overseas. Would not charge. Braun used to be known for quality German engineering, but no longer. It did give a close shave before failing, but I need a razor that is reliable. Note that there is a 60 day money back guarantee. They make it very difficult to find out information about how to return the shaver (call 800 211 6661 to get the return address) and they don't send your money back for 6-8 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Rex

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money. Almost every time I cut myself shaving.
customer_reviews.text: Girlfriend bought it for me for Christmas because I’ve always wanted one of these which is why I haven’t returned it but I would not buy it again. Takes double the time of a regular razor to shave and I cut myself 300x more. With a regular razor I cut myself maybe once every blue moon. With this I always cut myself at least 2-3 times because it’s very spotty. You have put down on the middle razor to actually get a cut going if you just have to shave some fix and stuff. Looks really cool and i can tell it would save so much Money in razors. If it worked.
customer_reviews.author: BuProject

customer_reviews.title: Battery Circuit Board Keeps Failing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this $110 shaver in August 2018. It has not lasted a year. Their is some flaw with the board to which the rechargeable battery is attached. It shorted out once and wouldn't recharge. After a lot of production, I mailed the product to a Braun repair facility that evidently recharged the battery and returned it. The recharge lasted several weeks. As soon as the battery required a another recharge, the battery circuit board shorted out again and failed. I will be purchasing a competitor product. This product was way too expensive to be a paper weight twice in 10 months.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This does not shave as well as my old Braun. It keeps missing hairs that tend to lay down. Ok for a touchup between shaves but it is actually quicker to shave with a safety razor. Not worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Wayne From Florida

customer_reviews.title: This shaver sucks
customer_reviews.text: Braun's advertising promises 2 years of use out the foil and trimmer. I got that on my old 7 series model which I used for over 10 years, but I bought the series 5 model a little over a year ago and I am about to purchase my 3rd replacement foil and trimmer because after 3 months I just don't get a close shave anymore. I have a very light beard and in my opinion this shaver gives a pitiful performance.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse T. Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Great Shaver!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a 13 year old Braun Shaver that finally died after a surprisingly long life. I have been pleasantly surprised by the new shaver. Read some of the reviews and was a little concerned about some of the issues reported (on/off different, doesn't shave close, doesn't sit well in the charging/cleaning stand, etc.) but have found absolutely none of that to be the case!! Great shave, more comfortable handle, no issues with the on/off button (in fact it;s an improvement in my opinion). I agree somewhat about the charging/cleaning station but just have to make sure it makes good contact.
customer_reviews.author: HAS

customer_reviews.title: Braun Junk!!!!  Be aware!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS RAZOR!!!!!! The razor stopped working in July . It was stuck on travel mode then once I got that off, it would not charge. I called Braun and Stephanie told me to send it to Lincoln NB for repair. $9.00 worth of postage later it was returned. Amazing it worked until yesterday July 30th. Now it's back to the same non-charging. This the second Braun in four years. The electronices are horrible! Million dollar shave ten cent electronics!!!! Norelco not much better. Guess it's time for Harry's razors. You have been warned!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy VandenBulke

customer_reviews.title: A great shaver I love it
customer_reviews.text: Finally a shaver I like.After using Norelco since the late 1940's.I founf the last great Norelco was the 3D sensio touch ,a nice smooth clean shave.Then ame the 8000 & 9000 series that roughed up my face pulled hairs Those morons changed it ,cheapened the shaver to save a few bucks ,now my face was sore.I own a Braun series 5 that's 10 years ald .I took it out charged it and liked it.I bought a new Braun series 5 ,this one .So nice to get a nice close shave that doesnt tear up your face .Bye Norelco we are finished ,hello Braun.
customer_reviews.author: hp1480

customer_reviews.title: NO CHARGER
customer_reviews.text: cheaply made, much worse than the 7 and 9 series. Comes WITHOUT a charger so only buy one if you already have a charger. I'd never buy again, AMZ says I cannot return mine. I would advise getting a better on that comes with a charger, preferably from a real store where you can see what you're getting.
customer_reviews.author: bonedocTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality.
customer_reviews.text: Gives a very close shave. Glad I spent a little more and got this model. My last one was a Braun 3-series. Was good but this seems to have a little more cutting power. Update: after 7 months of use it just died on me out of the blue. Does not turn on and does not charge. Poor quality for costing over $100.
customer_reviews.author: ED

customer_reviews.title: Super  customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the shaver because it was cited as being atop choice for African American men. Reducing hair bumps. Able to use wet or dry. Well I am a female African American who lost most of her hair following radiation treatments. Not sure what I did wrong but I had a head full of hair bumps. I contacted the seller and they provided a generous resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine H.

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Took sometime to understand how to operate it.. not a great trimmer
customer_reviews.author: Pavithra

customer_reviews.title: Best buy I have made for Razor
customer_reviews.text: I had my old one for over 10 years. Was afraid to get a new one because of razor burn / getting adjusted to a new razor. This had no problem. Like the black color, smaller and lighter. EASY grip also. Did not have ANY face burns (I have sensitive skin) smooth shave Battery lasted a long time. GET IT!
customer_reviews.author: Bob from Upper Eastside

customer_reviews.title: Works well except for some neck hairs
customer_reviews.text: I keep a beard but clean up my neck daily. As other reviews mentioned, this shaver is great except it leaves a few random neck hairs. To get a cleaner shave, I've tried shaving quickly before and again after a shower and usually the slide out trimmer on the back side helps get most of the stubborn necks hairs. My neck is never as clean as it would be with a wet razor, but it's passable for day to day shaves.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan McCourt

customer_reviews.title: The best just keeps getting better.
customer_reviews.text: Braun makes the nicest electric shavers on the market. This particular model is just a step up from series 3. You get a better shave sensor, movable and lockable head, a built in trimmer on the back, and a very nice cleaning dock. Significantly better dock than the 3 Series. It’s nearly identical to series 7 but much less expensive. I find series 9 four blades are just too big for my face. What you don’t get is a travel pouch but it does have lockout mode to prevent the razor from accidentally running while inside your luggage. My last Braun razor lasted 14 years with daily use. I hope this one will be about the same.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: BEST ELECTRIC RAZOR EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I've used lots of different electric razors and this is hands down the best ever. I wore my last Braun out after 5 years and this Series 5 gives me the fastest and closest shave I've ever had with an electric razor. It's easy to clean with or without the automatic cleaner. Most comfortable electric razor I've ever had. I've read and seen pics of the razor foils wearing out and I will have to wait to see about that, but I changed the foils on my last Series 3 Braun once or twice a year and never had any of them wear out in over 5 years and I shave a heavy beard every day! ! !
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Bales

customer_reviews.title: Very good shaver. Cleaning station of limited use
customer_reviews.text: I've been a Braun user for over 30 years. This Braun shaver gives a close shave, though I liked my earlier Series 5 with a 52S head better. More passes are needed at the jaw line and on the throat. This 5190 cc shaver died under 2years, but their warranty shop did a great job of restoring my shaver to a like-new condition. I use the cleaning station infrequently; I usually just blow out the shaved hairs from the detached head and from the body. I have also emptied the original cleaning station solution and replaced it with denatured ethanol or 90% isopropanol, and 3-4 drops of lemon oil; 70% isopropanol does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Andybel

customer_reviews.title: Much better than Series 3.
customer_reviews.text: I used Braun electric shavers for the last 40 years. Recently I noticed that Series 3 are not as good as they were in the past. I decided to switch to Series 5 and I am happy I did. This shaver is a new design, more efficient and superior to Series 3 not only by price but by quality. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ursus

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shaver.
customer_reviews.text: Love this shaver. Holds a charge for weeks. Oiled it once with a little oil on my finger. Clean shave.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Not as good a shave as I'd hope
customer_reviews.text: I'll keep it short and sweet; It's a good razor. It's sturdy, battery life is good, it feels good to use. Maybe it's a personal shortcoming, but I can't seem to get a good shave with this thing unless I really put some effort into it. Even with cleaning and lubricating the razor head, and preparing my face before shaving I notice tugging and uneven shaves. It doesn't do well on long hair, you'll want to shave early and often with this (that being said, the pop-out trimmer is great for pre-shaving longer hair that you can then go over again with the razor head).
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: The first one stopped recharging or cleaning in the station after about a week, but I could charge the razor with the power cord. Amazon sent me a replacement, but the second one did the same thing after about a week. There will be no third one.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce D Klein

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shaver! It's by far the most comfortable and efficient shaver I've ever had. The cleaning base works well, and it's very apparent that the lubricating action is very effective for the shaver's function. It cuts close and with a minimal number of passes. I have curly hair, which makes it very difficult to even get all my whiskers at all with any other shaver I've ever used, but with this Braun I don't have that problem at all. Nothing left behind. I highly recommend this shaver!
customer_reviews.author: tommytrekr

customer_reviews.title: does not shave
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shaver based on it's brand name and was sorely disappointed.. The shaver did not shave period so I bought two new shaver heads with no change. I was surprised that it just didn't work at all, so this is a warning! Do not buy the 5 series braun shaver or you could have the same disappointing results like me. I learned the hard way.
customer_reviews.author: Steve DeWitt

customer_reviews.title: Best razor I’ve had.
customer_reviews.text: I had a braun series 3 for 12 years and it worked impressively well. I bought this hoping to have another long lasting quality shaver and it does amazing work. It gives me a closer shave than a straight razor or safety razor. I think it’s by far worth the money. The shave is very close and smooth, I don’t get much if any razor burn, the cleaner is easy to use. Doesn’t pull or pinch. Travel is easy and the charge lasts for an hour on a single charge. I’ve used it for 10 minutes at a time for 2 weeks daily and it still didn’t die. I will absolutely buy this or the series 7 again.
customer_reviews.author: Prfine

customer_reviews.title: Great Shaver not needing automated cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I found the best shave with this to be wet using only water. The shaver glides very comfortably with soap too, but it's not necessary. Shaving dry is OK, but sometimes the shaver catches and pulls on a 2-4 day beard growth. Regarding the cleaner/charger, it uses a liquid identified with a warning as being hazardous. I think this cleaning method is overkill for the really simple act of rinsing whiskers out of the shaver's easily removable head. I returned my 5190cc and exchanged it for a 5147 saving $45 and not having to suffer the very large cleaning vat on the sink top.
customer_reviews.author: Alpha Shark

customer_reviews.title: nIce razor,
customer_reviews.text: however nice the razor is the the trimer is awkward & recessed to be really useful. MY OPINION, I DON'T USE THE TRIMMER MUCH, , USED IT FORA YEAR NOW, JJUST USE EVERY DAY OR EVERY DAY, ANY MORE THAN IS A STRUGGLE FOR IT . COME TIME TO REPLACE THE HEAD IS A BIT EXPENSIVE . $43-$45 HERE FOR THAT MODLE . AM SATISFIED WITH IT FOR THE PRICE, . NOT THE BEST ENGINE ON THE TRACK BUT HOLDS HOLDS ON PRETTY WELL
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM FISHER

customer_reviews.title: Great shave
customer_reviews.text: This replaced an older Braun 3 series shaver. I have been using Braun for at least 30 years and will never change. This Series 5 is improved over my previous shaver. It gives a nice close shave and the optional pivotal head makes it easy to get to the hard to get spots. While I would have liked a cap for the head, the case is nice. Can’t go wrong with this Braun.
customer_reviews.author: JimBob

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, well made
customer_reviews.text: This is my first electric razor and I'm pretty pleased with it. It has plenty of power to go through a tough beard. The battery last an incredibly long time. The trimmer is definitely an added bonus and works very well. It definitely isn't as good as a bladed razor. But if you keep up on your beard and use it every day, it's much easier and quicker than using a razor every day.
customer_reviews.author: D. Nardi

customer_reviews.title: Motor stopped working after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: I noticed motor getting sluggish and intermittently stopping. Within a few days it stopped working all together. After going back to my ol 7 series I am also more aware how inferior the shave is in the 5 series. I would have given one star however I am hopeful that Braun will make good on this and let me get back into a 7 series. I've always had god luck with Braun shavers in the past, but I always purchase their top models. This was the first time I stepped down.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey J. Comeau

customer_reviews.title: Terrible cutting
customer_reviews.text: My facial hair grows very slowly and I only need to shave 2-3 times a week. This device doesn't cut hair correctly at all. Misses 90% of all the hair and in order to get a "semi-decent" shave requires going over the same spot 5-7 times. This causes my skin to become blemished and breaks out. It pulls my hair like a very dull razor would. I do not recommend this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S

customer_reviews.title: Nice razor, bad trimmer
customer_reviews.text: The razor does a nice job, and the cleaning system works well and quickly, but the trimmer leaves a lot to be desired. I had a Braun razor for years until the On/Off switch broke and decided to replace it with this model despite what the reviews said about the trimmer. Why they ever made it smaller and put it on the back of the unit is beyond me. The old trimmer was great, but this one is very hit and miss. For what you pay for these razors, they should've had a better design.
customer_reviews.author: Donald F. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Does not provide a clean shave - takes longer to shave, not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't not provide a good close shave as advertised. Have to go over area 5-6 times then still leaves stubble. Could have easily purchased a cheaper Target brand and gotten the same experience. I was replacing my older Braun Electric Razor which I had for years so I am extremely disappointed. Only reason I purchased a new one was because mine was so outdated I couldn't find new blades for it - that is how much I loved it.
customer_reviews.author: TamiJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect razor!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this razor. This is the 2nd time ordering this. The 1st one lasted almost 3 years. The only reason it needed replaced is because he dropped his razor and it chipped the corner of the blade. This razor shaves well, charges easily and has the convenient attached cleaner. It's a little more pricey than other razors, but well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: christine spencer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product but I do not recommend it for African American men
customer_reviews.text: Quality product but I do not recommend it for African American men. We tend to get razer bumps more frequently and at time this does not help or making it worst.
customer_reviews.author: Status

customer_reviews.title: Razor burn in effect!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice razor. Unfortunately, since i upgraded to this from the 3 series, I've been getting razor burn. First time ever. Whish i could upgrade to the higher model with hopes to avoid the burn. Maybe I should downgrade...But i just love the cleaning station and cant go back! Looks great though.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Good Shave, Expensive to Maintain.Bulky to store
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing. The small charging dock and storage case pictured were not included. Instructions state that the cleaning cartridge should be replaced every 4 weeks ($7.00 each, $84 year). The Foil and Cutter Cassette must be replace every 18 months - $36. Shaving results were good on 1-2 days growth, fair on 3-5 days. Think I'll try a different model.
customer_reviews.author: SJS Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Painful Shave...beware!
customer_reviews.text: Yikes...I have owned at least five Braun shavers over the past 30 years and have had great, painless shaves from all of them...until now. After two weeks of use, I have finally decided that I cannot use this shaver any longer because it yanks the hair on my face (regardless of the length) and is simply too painful to endure every day. Unfortunately, I tossed the packaging already so don't know if I can return. I want a second shaver for travel but now uncertain what to buy?!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mann

customer_reviews.title: Two Failures in 22 Months
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Braun Series 5 5190/5190cc in Oct. 2017. It failed to start in May, 2019, and a circuit board was replaced under warranty. In July, 2020, the shaver again would shut off while shaving, and would not start. The battery was fully charged. Braun offered a $50 debit card, but would not replace or repair the shaver.. My first Braun shaver lasted about 7 years. This series 5 calls into question Braun quality and/or quality control. Apparently there was a problem with their circuit boards, but they did not take responsibility for installing defective boards. The cleaning system worked well, and so did the shaver, when it wasn't broken!
customer_reviews.author: dek

customer_reviews.title: good all around shaver with some minor design flaws
customer_reviews.text: Good for: quick easy shaves, shaves head as well as face, easy clean and nice docking station for shaver Minor flaws: no slot on cleaning station for cleaning brush, did not come with oil for maintenance, trimmer design blocked by shaving cassette (removing cassette helps somewhat but does not provide good visibility for edging beards)
customer_reviews.author: Mr&MsBark

customer_reviews.title: Great Shaver
customer_reviews.text: Wow, Ive been using my very old Braun Series 5 forever and finally the charging dock broke so had to get a new one. I was tempted of course to get the latest model with all the bells and whistles but something kept pulling me back to the new 5, so I bought it. My first shave was something I could barely relate to, it was so incredibly smooth, gliding over my skin while giving me a good, close shave. Couldnt be more delighted.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great Razor....Watch when you need to purchase replacement parts.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this razor from Amazon a few years ago for my son. He loves it and it has been a great razor. Just now needing a new foil and cutter. Beware....the foil and cutter that is matched for this razor on Amazon’s website does not fit. Thankfully through the package you can easily see that it is way smaller than the foil and cutter on the razor. Contacted Amazon and returning it for no charge!! Guess I need to do a little more research for one that will fit.
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Great shaver!
customer_reviews.text: A definite improvement over the previous version which I had for many years. Holds the charge more than a week with daily use. Can't justify the base unit that cleans and lubes the shaver. You can charge the shaver with the power cord so the use is really for cleaning which you can do by just removing the shaver head and running everything under running water. The replacement cartridges for the base unit are too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: JoeD

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shaver
customer_reviews.text: Instead of purchasing a new screen for my +10 year old Braun 5 series shaver, I decided to upgrade to this latest model. I'm so glad I did!. The new technology noticeably improved over an already decent and long lasting model. The result is the closest and easiest shave I've ever experienced.
customer_reviews.author: trader

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as good as the old series 5
customer_reviews.text: This is my third series 5 Braun razor. This new one isn’t quite as good as the old ones. Takes longer to get a close shave. The edge trimmer it’s hard to engage and doesn’t trim as well as the old series 5. This Braun is still better than other brands I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: James Brown

customer_reviews.title: Nice shaver
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for his birthday. He picked it out and he really likes it. Likes the shave and trimming features and the easy cleaning caddy. Charges quick and lasts. This is about all I can say as I do not use the product myself.
customer_reviews.author: steelaway

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Clean and close shave without skin irritation
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit I was a bit skeptical about this razor. I didn't think an electric razor would be able to give me a close shave. Man, I was seriously wrong! After the first shave I was delighted with its ease of use and cleaning, but most of all, of how a close shave you can get. This is a product of great quality. Comes in a very nice packaging and its cleaning/charging station makes cleaning and maintnance super easy!
customer_reviews.author: Jordiceo

customer_reviews.title: Returned it
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work nearly as well a my old series 3 I shipped it back.
customer_reviews.author: Hurricane Rico

customer_reviews.title: Nice razor
customer_reviews.text: I cannot give it five stars. It takes several passes to cut my hair. Feels good in hand and easy to maneuver but I cannot give it a good rating since it doesn't cut well on first and second pass.
customer_reviews.author: none

customer_reviews.title: Never a big fan of Elecric shavers, --until now !
customer_reviews.text: I really like this wet/dry self-cleaning (you still have to brush out the inside before "cleaning" (not difficult, quick release head). This shaves as close as a traditional blade, seriously, and no skin irritation. The only slight negative is the picture only directions are a little obtuse. But, you can eventually figure it out. Love it !
customer_reviews.author: Edmond J. (Skip) O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: Better than my last Braun
customer_reviews.text: I find this razor is very good and actually does a better job than my last Braun razor. I use it to touch up my daily shaving with regular shaving cream and razor. I have not used the cleaner or cleaning solution yet, but I am tempted to take care of this razor to make it last and give these kind of shaves for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Ray arpin

customer_reviews.title: Cuts poorly then head corroded from alchohol cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I give this razor low marks. Was hoping to be able to use it between blade shavings but it takes several passes over the same area to cut fully. I tried several different methods: circular, side to side, up and down, against the grain, you name it, usually all of the above each time. Then after a year the head has begun to corrode, with holes in it. didnt realize the tiny holes at first til i cut myself. I do not recommend this razor. I expected much much more from Braun. I've long thought they were the king of razors. No more. Im looking for a way to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Chip McDermott

customer_reviews.title: Spend the Money. Braun 5 series quality is worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Close, smooth shave for my sensitive skin and easy clean-up. Excellent electric razor... This is my 3rd Braun Electric Shaver. I still have a Braun from 15 years ago and now it will be my back-up shaver. I;ve tried the cheaper brands and they don't come close to the reliability and quality of the Braun 5 Series.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great all around shaver
customer_reviews.text: Brain makes the best electric shaver on the market. That’s no secret. I dropped my last S5 one too many times so I replaced with the same model (this one). It’s cordless/rechargeable, water resistant and cleanable, including the really cool cleaning base that comes with it, shaves nicely, and if treated well should last you a couple years. I highly recommend this model!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Van Winkle

customer_reviews.title: Very good electric - holds charge really well
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Loved battery life and performance of the razor. A great shave while leaving skin intact. Love the locking mechanism to avoid accidentally running it while travelling. Cons: Charging station is pretty large compared to some other brands; functionality of the trimmer is limited due to how it is oriented on the razor (had to buy a separate trimmer) - but it works "ok" for business travel.
customer_reviews.author: BGavs

customer_reviews.title: Braun series 5 (5145s) Razor
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the size of the razor which is larger than other razors, but it is still comfortable to hold. After using the Braun for a week now, I have been pleasantly surprised how cleanly it shaves. It also holds a charge well. I would have liked a cap to protect the foil from damage but it wasn't offered with this razor. After using a Panasonic, and an Andis razor, I like the Braun the best. I like the less expensive foil and cutter block replacement, but be careful when ordering. Not all series 5 razors take the same replacement block. Great razor so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Clegg

customer_reviews.title: Better than Norelco
customer_reviews.text: Historically I've always used Norelco shavers because my sensitive skin has a tendency to break in hives if I shave too much with a razor. When my Norelco bit the dust recently, I decided to try something new. Man, I'm glad I did. I like this shaver better than all previous ones. The cleaning/charging station is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: E. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: May Not Meets Your Needs
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Braun Series 5 (5090 cc) in May of this year, my only problem was that I didn't return it. To be fair, however, I am over 65 with a soft beard that seems to grow every which way. The Braun does a terrible job of attempting to cut these hairs. I have actually cut into the skin (like a wet shave) trying to use it, on occasion. If you have a stiff medium to heavy beard, it may meet your needs; but if you are like me, with a light soft beard, I would suggest that you keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 30 day Short life span!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my husband. He used it for 1 month and it wouldn't charge up again!!!! It's cost is not worth the short lived product. Husband said he did like the close shave, but wouldn't have paid what I paid for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. CHRISTOPHE

customer_reviews.title: Close shave , minimal irritation
customer_reviews.text: Have used for nearly 4 months now and am pretty happy with my 1st electric shaver in 30 years. Shaves close enough, although stubble noticable faster than after using a razor. I dry shave and no real irritation. I find that I mostly have to use it in locked position in order to get closest shave. Cleaning fluid lasted about 3 months, not running every shave though. Cleaning station is loud, but effective. Pretty bulky for my shaving kit, battery lasted on one charge for a 3 night trip. Overall, 4.75 stars.😀
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but can't shave neck
customer_reviews.text: The system is pretty nice, the stand looks nice and the razor has a good look and the shaver on the back side works great, but that is about the end of the good parts. There are large swaths of my neck that it cannot seem to trim no matter how many times I go over it or the angle I use. I literally had to shave after shaving when using this. As far as I can tell the razor is designed to sit crooked in its stand which there isn't anything actually wrong with but looks funky. Unless you have a stone pillar of a neck with no contours or edges this one isn't for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality of product
customer_reviews.text: The item was shipped on time and I received it on the estimated time of delivery. Product is working fine. It is a little bit heavy for a small tool. I have not tested the battery life at this time, but I have used it for several days now and I have not yet recharged it. So the charge is holding longer than expected.
customer_reviews.author: CHARLIE P BAROY

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for sensitive skins!!
customer_reviews.text: Having my skin being very sensitive, it was really difficult for me to shave in a regular basis. I looked up for a great electric shaver and I concluded that Braun is the ONE! And I was so right about it. Never been happier with my no-beard clean look!
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: Battery has a very short life, less than 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Works well and give a shave almost as close as a manual and closer than Panasonic shavers But this is the second one I have had with a short battery life the first one about 10 months, this one just over six months Works out too expensive to be useful
customer_reviews.author: Robin Carruthers

customer_reviews.title: Cuts sharply
customer_reviews.text: Very good shaver. Cuts sharply and better than a razor. It is easy to clean and keep. I got this shaver because normal razors irritate my skin a lot and I get shaving bumps. If you use this machine appropriately and shave the right way it will not irritate your skin. The only downside, probably unique for me, is the smell of the cleaning liquid. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: David Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Will only buy Braun going forward
customer_reviews.text: Switched from a Panasonic ES8109 to the Braun 5090cc as my Panasonic was on its last breath. The Panasonic would always give me razor burn and cut my face when I used the trimmer. The cleaning system also broke, so I decided to buy a new electric shaver. After reading reviews from consumer reports and here, those led me to purchase this Braun product. I am pretty astonished at how smooth and non irritating the foils are, and it's very simple to clean. I am very satisfied with this purchase, and highly recommend it to anyone looking for a new electric shaver
customer_reviews.author: Wde2011

customer_reviews.title: comfortable shave
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shave. I have been using Norelco rotary shavers for the last 10 years, and the Braun Series 3 is much more comfortable. I always used shaving cream with the Norelco, but no need to with the Braun. I just shave dry and have no burning at all. Also, a much closer shave than the Norelco, and it gets the long, odd shaped hairs on my neck without having to use the trimmer. I have a medium beard, certainly not course, but not overly fine either. I just got this, so no comments on battery life, nor life of the screen/cutter
customer_reviews.author: Jan Stegeman

customer_reviews.title: Braun and Krups never let you down
customer_reviews.text: It is a good razor you clean yourself. You can use it in the shower. It comes with a small travel case. It is nicely balanced in the hand and is pretty quiet. It is also not super heavy. I am female and use it on my legs. It is not pink; that works for me.
customer_reviews.author: A. M.

customer_reviews.title: It works  Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced. $130 is ridiculous. It’s worth about $50 that’s it Does the job but way overpriced probably cost about three dollars to make in China
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Very good for head shaving
customer_reviews.text: I have been shaving my head for 5 years with disposable shavers. Those gave a close shave but left head with red blotches. Did a lot of research before settling on 5 series Braun. Very happy with shaver. Does not shave as close as blades but does a pretty good job. I can shave every other day and no issues and red blotches are gone. No extra bells and whistles but it does what I want it to do at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: Gabe D

customer_reviews.title: Nice shaver
customer_reviews.text: My husband hates to shave and has a heavy beard. He wore his last shaver out (different brand) so I spent a little more on this one and he’s really pleased with it. Says the shave is comfortable and he especially likes how it cleans itself.
customer_reviews.author: MorningGlory

customer_reviews.title: Great shaver!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shaver. I bought this as a replacement for my previous Series 5 Braun shaver (had it a lot of years). This new one is even smoother. After having the first one for many years and replacing the shaving blade and screen a bunch, I was in search of another one with the cleaner. Too many shavers do not have it and I, for one, love it. It's so simple: shave, open the screen and tap out the shavings, place the shaver in the base unit and push the button. Next morning it's nice and fresh and clean and recharged ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW it is the closest and most comfortable shave ive ever had in my life
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and Ive been hesitant to get an electric all my life. Ive always used manual. I've usually kept my beard long but This year, I decided im going for a clean look. I couldnt imagine shaving with a manual blade every day so I decided to give this a try. WOW it is the closest and most comfortable shave ive ever had in my life. I recommend this to everybody! Great price. Much better shave then buying a bunch of cartridges. Glad i tried it!
customer_reviews.author: Kazuyoshi O.

customer_reviews.title: but after a few weeks it is getting better. My skin had to get used to the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for an older Braun series 5 shaver. The styling is nicer on this model. The power cable is improved. The older one had a metal band on the outside of the plug that made contact with the shaver (that's what broke on my older one). I don't see this cable ever breaking. At first it didn't shave as close as the older model, but after a few weeks it is getting better. My skin had to get used to the new razor. It is the same when I go from Braun to a Norelco. My face gets rashy but after using it for awhile, my skin gets used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Back of razor came apart within one year. Sent it off to have it repaired under warranty and had to pay for shipping. Repairs to twice as long as what I was told. Had the razor for 5 months and it came apart again. Repair center didn’t repair it but instead tried to glue the broken and missing pieces back together unsuccessfully. Now Even though it has a two year warranty, I’m getting the run around about getting my money back. Braun has gone down hill!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Morrissey

customer_reviews.title: the cleaner charger has broken down in just one year
customer_reviews.text: I cant get in touch with anyone one at braun. It appears that I got screwed... but the razor does work well the cleaner does not but then again the charging part of the female mechanism is working
customer_reviews.author: Ricochet

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: This is one terrific, wonderful, marvelous, fantastic, etc. etc. I hope you get my honest opinion about this shaver, I waited 5 months before I gave this review since it was such an expensive item. I can only say you get a lot of bang for your buck on this puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great shaver .
customer_reviews.text: This I s my first electric razor in 79 years and I absolutely love it . I'll never go back to razor blades . I am so surprised I didn't do this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: terry wotring

customer_reviews.title: Product description is completely false!
customer_reviews.text: Description says this comes with a Travel Case - BUT IT DOES NOT!!! The shaver is z very good shaver but when one pays for a proiduct as advertised and represented, one expects to get what it says. And to top it off, I had to spend time with Amazon to refurn it as the system first said it was not eligible for return (despite Prime and despite being within the return time).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: horsepower
customer_reviews.text: i was triple head guy for years but whenever i needed new blades i might as well buy a new razor. the braun is like a american muscle car and u will like it
customer_reviews.author: RTM

customer_reviews.title: amazing shaver but short life
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge fan of all Braun electric shavers. However my most recent purchase for the series 5 was disappointing. It was amazing at first, but 13 months in and the battery is completely dead with no support/warranty available. customer service is no help. I'm disappointed with braun and their service and will not be buying any of their products again.

customer_reviews.title: Best electric razor I've used
customer_reviews.text: Best electric razor I've used, though it's not perfect. The cut is comfortable and clean but it can still take a couple of repeat strokes (along jawline and under the chin esp.) to make certain that all of the angled hairs get caught which will still leave my sensitive skin irritated resulting in the noticeable red bumps after all is said and done. Having said that, I do truly enjoy this razor and have not once regretted my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is great, it’s easy to clean - Just put it in the holder and let it do the self clean or just brush some of the hair out with a small brush. Wouldn’t recommend using for traveling because the holder has an alcohol canister in it and it’ll spill if it falls over.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas H.

customer_reviews.title: Razor
customer_reviews.text: The whole equipment work neat, cleaning machine does it job nice and que the electric razor cuts the hair very well.
customer_reviews.author: Elisander

customer_reviews.title: 9 months of use
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this razor for about nine months. About 3 weeks ago, possibly longer, it just stopped working. It seems like the battery is dead. I had no warning at all. I started to use it and it shot off soon after starting. It never worked again. I have charged it and I get nothing. Prior to this, I was not necessarily happy with it but I did get used to it and was fine with the razor.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Sisk

customer_reviews.title: Very nice razor
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job shaving, just about as good as a blade and it is quite comfortable too. Comes apart easily to clean under running water and using the factory cleaning tank weekly, keeps it very clean. It seems to run for quite a while on a single charge, but since I clean it once weekly in the cleaning solution it also charges it. Therefore, I'm unable to comment on just how long it will run on a single charge.. I believe the booklet states 45 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: joeye

customer_reviews.title: Great men's electric razor
customer_reviews.text: The Braun 5090cc is a great razor. I'm particular about my facial hair grooming and this razor makes that simple. The only downside to this razor is that the trimmer is very narrow, at least compared to the Braun 3000 Series. It is much harder for me to get clean and consistent trimming due to the narrower width.
customer_reviews.author: PatP

customer_reviews.title: Best model for the money.
customer_reviews.text: The battery last a long time and I did not see the need for the fancy cleaning kit. I just run it under water with the blade off, rinse the blade and occasionally oil. Great for quick daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Ben S.

customer_reviews.title: Great travel shaver
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my 15 year old Braun travel razor that had a lost cord with this Series 5 model. This is so nice. Fast and smooth!
customer_reviews.author: Expo Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Smooth shave!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad a couple months ago and he is still very impressed with it. It's a nice smooth shave for his sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Mizanoski

customer_reviews.title: Great for scraggly Asian facial hair.
customer_reviews.text: I have had issues with electric shavers just not giving me a clean shave so I was hesitant to buy a fancy one. This one works really well. It gets all those tiny little hairs that cheaper electric shavers normally leave. I am Asian and I really don't grow that much facial hair... but if anyone is like me, you know that if you don't shave for a week you look either sleazy or like you're going through puberty. Love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Chan

customer_reviews.title: Nice dock for cleaning and keeps a charge for a few shaves.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband because he gets bad razor burn with a straight edge. Using this razor he no longer has any razor burn. Nice dock for cleaning and keeps a charge for a few shaves.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Lucabaugh

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and effective
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use keeps a good charge and is a big improvement over my older model from 2003. Comfortable and as good as a razor I actually like using it every day! Hope it lasts like the older model. My only issue is holding it and hitting the on/off button. I hold it like my older model and have turned it off a few times. But the shave is great. Used it for a week on a trip still charged when I got home
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great shaver. Could not be happier for the price. Auto clean makes it simple as all can be. If you buy it with the auto cleaner the shaver & base are made in Germany VS China if you get just the shaver. Yes, Braun has a Chinese plant.
customer_reviews.author: john wesley hardin

customer_reviews.title: Love the razor, stand/cleaner a little to be desired
customer_reviews.text: Got the package in the mail, everything in order. Razor seems really well made and ergonomic. Same can't be said for the cleaning/charging stand. Seems like cheap plastic and I just know there is a spill of the cleaning solution in my future. That being said, it seems to do the job okay. I'm pretty impressed with the razor itself, not as close as an actual blade, but for quick/comfort this is quality razor.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This broke apart!! The actually razor head comes off with the cap and won’t work at all anymore.
customer_reviews.author: BBRITT

customer_reviews.title: Best shaver I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon, thank you for going the extra mile to get this shaver. I used it for the first time and I'm so impressed with this shaver. I have MS so I need a great shaver to shave my head. My hands shake so much a razor blade was out of the question. This shaver shaves close and clean. Than put it back in its station and it cleans its self. Thanks again, your costumer service has always worked hard to help me get the right product in a fast delivery date.
customer_reviews.author: Chuckrosinski

customer_reviews.title: great shaver. In my opinion you can't get a better shaver then this one 🐋
customer_reviews.text: The Besssst.🎩🎩🎩🎩🎩 hands down, I've owned about 5 shavers and found that this one really get the tuff ones and hard to get hairs with a little pressure. Would definitely buy it again. Happy happy. ❤️ I have use this shaver for 19 months now and is still shaving great.
customer_reviews.author: Seahorse

product_meta.title: Electric Razor for Men by Braun, Series 5 5190cc Electric Shaver with Precision Trimmer, Rechargeable, Wet & Dry, Clean & Charge Station and Travel Case
feature_bullets: Electric shaver with skin sensitive technology for maximum performance and excellent skin comfort
AutoSensing motor for efficient shaving in every stroke, even with dense beards
8-Direction Comfort flex head for constant skin contact, even in difficult areas. MicroMotion individual suspension of all cutting elements even responds to the smallest contours.
100% waterproof for a refreshing shave with water, foam, gel, or even under the shower
Clean & Charge Station cleans, lubricates and dries shaver hygienically.Works with 100V to 240V AC
Official Electric Shaver of the NFL
FlexMotionTec delivers more efficient shaving with less skin pressure to minimize skin irritation
World’s only 4-action, alcohol-based Clean & Charge Station: It Cleans, Charges, Lubricates and Selects the cleaning program with one touch of a button
UltraActiveLift lifts and cuts flat-lying hairs from hard to reach areas
New & improved Braun Series 5 succeeds where others fail. Maximum performance and skin comfort. Even in problem areas.
3X better adaptation. New FlexMotionTec delivers efficient shaving with less pressure, minimizing skin irritation.
20% more motor power. New PowerDrive ensures high-speed cutting, even on dense beards.
